languages.text: {n}После краткой заминки сквозь шипение вокса вновь раздается голос Вигдис.{/n} "Позвольте повторить, Лорд-капитан: "Обет Императора", флагманский корабль Вольного Торговца Каллигоса Винтерскейла, обнаружен на орбите Кетца Темера, одного из миров династии Винтерскейл. Будут ли от вас какие-либо распоряжения?"

{n}After a brief hesitation, Vigdis's voice comes through the hissing of static once more.{/n} "Allow me to repeat, Lord Captain: the Emperor's Vow, the flagship of Rogue Trader Calligos Winterscale, has been detected in the orbit of Quetza Temer, one of the Winterscale worlds. What are your orders?"
languages.original_text: {n}После краткой заминки сквозь шипение вокса вновь раздается голос Вигдис.{/n} "Позвольте повторить, Лорд-капитан: "Обет Императора", флагманский корабль Вольного Торговца Каллигоса Винтерскейла, обнаружен на орбите Кетца Темера, одного из миров династии Винтерскейл. Будут ли от вас какие-либо распоряжения?"

traits.locale_text: {n}After a brief hesitation, Vigdis's voice comes through the hissing of static once more.{/n} "Allow me to repeat, Lord Captain: Emperor's Vow, the flagship of Rogue Trader Calligos Winterscale, is located in the orbit of Quetza Temer, one of the worlds of the Winterscale dynasty. Will there be any instructions?"

{n}After a brief hesitation, Vigdis's voice comes through the hissing of static once more.{/n} "Allow me to repeat, Lord Captain: Emperor's Vow, the flagship of Rogue Trader Calligos Winterscale, is located in the orbit of Quetza Temer, one of the worlds of the Winterscale dynasty. Will there be any instructions?"

{n}After a brief hesitation, Vigdis's voice comes through the hissing of static once more.{/n} "Allow me to repeat, Lord Captain: Emperor's Vow, the flagship of Rogue Trader Calligos Winterscale, has been detected in orbit of Quetza Temer, one of the Winterscale dynasty's worlds. Will you follow with any instructions?"

{n}After a brief hesitation, Vigdis's voice comes through the hissing of static once more.{/n} "Allow me to repeat, Lord Captain: Emperor's Vow, the flagship of Rogue Trader Calligos Winterscale, has been detected in orbit of Quetza Temer, one of the Winterscale dynasty's worlds. Will you follow with any instructions?"

{n}After a brief hesitation, Vigdis's voice comes through the hissing of static once more.{/n} "Allow me to repeat, Lord Captain: the Emperor's Vow, the flagship of Rogue Trader Calligos Winterscale, has been detected in the orbit of Quetza Temer, one of the Winterscale worlds. What are your orders?"

languages.text: {n}维格迪斯犹豫了片刻之后，声音再次透过静电的嘶嘶声传来。{/n}“请允许我重复一遍，舰长大人。我们在格扎尔特默的轨道上探测到了帝皇誓约号，那是行商浪人卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔的旗舰，目前正停靠在温特斯凯尔王朝的行星上。您有什么指示吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}After a brief hesitation, Vigdis's voice comes through the hissing of static once more.{/n} "Allow me to repeat, Lord Captain: the Emperor's Vow, the flagship of Rogue Trader Calligos Winterscale, has been detected in the orbit of Quetza Temer, one of the Winterscale worlds. What are your orders?"

traits.locale_text: {n}维格迪斯犹豫了片刻之后，声音再次透过静电的嘶嘶声传来。{/n}“请允许我重复一遍，舰长大人。我们在格扎尔特默的轨道上探测到了帝皇誓约号，那是行商浪人卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔的旗舰，目前正停靠在温特斯凯尔王朝的行星上。您有什么指示吗？”

languages.text: {n}Après une brève hésitation, la voix de Vigdis se fait à nouveau entendre dans un grésillement.{/n} « Permettez-moi de répéter, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} : le Serment de l'Empereur, le vaisseau amiral du libre-marchand Calligos Winterscale, a été détecté en orbite autour de Quetza Temer, l'un des mondes des Winterscale. Quels sont vos ordres ? »
languages.original_text: {n}After a brief hesitation, Vigdis's voice comes through the hissing of static once more.{/n} "Allow me to repeat, Lord Captain: the Emperor's Vow, the flagship of Rogue Trader Calligos Winterscale, has been detected in the orbit of Quetza Temer, one of the Winterscale worlds. What are your orders?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Après une brève hésitation, la voix de Vigdis se fait à nouveau entendre dans un grésillement.{/n} « Permettez-moi de répéter, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} : le Serment de l'Empereur, le vaisseau amiral du libre-marchand Calligos Winterscale, a été détecté en orbite autour de Quetza Temer, l'un des mondes des Winterscale. Quels sont vos ordres ? »

languages.text: {n}Nach kurzem Zögern ist Vigdis' Stimme trotz des Rauschens wieder zu hören.{/n} "Gestattet mir, mich zu wiederholen, Lord Captain: die Eid des Imperators, das Flaggschiff des Freihändlers Calligos Winterzunder, wurde im Orbit von Quetza Temer gesichtet, einer der Winterzunder-Welten. Wie lauten Eure Befehle?"
languages.original_text: {n}After a brief hesitation, Vigdis's voice comes through the hissing of static once more.{/n} "Allow me to repeat, Lord Captain: the Emperor's Vow, the flagship of Rogue Trader Calligos Winterscale, has been detected in the orbit of Quetza Temer, one of the Winterscale worlds. What are your orders?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach kurzem Zögern ist Vigdis' Stimme trotz des Rauschens wieder zu hören.{/n} "Gestattet mir, mich zu wiederholen, Lord Captain: die Eid des Imperators, das Flaggschiff des Freihändlers Calligos Winterzunder, wurde im Orbit von Quetza Temer gesichtet, einer der Winterzunder-Welten. Wie lauten Eure Befehle?"

{n}Nach kurzem Zögern ist Vigdis' Stimme trotz des Rauschen erneut zu hören.{/n} "Gestattet mir, mich zu wiederholen, Lord Captain: Emperor's Vow, das Flaggschiff des Freihändlers Calligos Winterzunder, wurde im Orbit von Quetza Temer gesichtet, einer der Welten der Winterzunder-Dynastie. Gibt es diesbezüglich irgendwelche Anweisungen?"

languages.text: {n}Tras dudar por un momento, la voz de Vigdis vuelve a interrumpir el silbido de la estática.{/n} «Se lo repetiré, Lord Capitán: hemos detectado el Voto del Emperador, la nave insignia del Comerciante Independiente Calligos Winterscale, en órbita en Quetza Temer, uno de los mundos de Winterscale. ¿Sus órdenes?».
languages.original_text: {n}After a brief hesitation, Vigdis's voice comes through the hissing of static once more.{/n} "Allow me to repeat, Lord Captain: the Emperor's Vow, the flagship of Rogue Trader Calligos Winterscale, has been detected in the orbit of Quetza Temer, one of the Winterscale worlds. What are your orders?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras dudar por un momento, la voz de Vigdis vuelve a interrumpir el silbido de la estática.{/n} «Se lo repetiré, Lord Capitán: hemos detectado el Voto del Emperador, la nave insignia del Comerciante Independiente Calligos Winterscale, en órbita en Quetza Temer, uno de los mundos de Winterscale. ¿Sus órdenes?».

languages.text: {n}少しためらった後、ヴィグディスの声が雑音を通して再び聞こえてくる。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、もう一度聞いてください。自由開拓者、カリゴス・ウィンタースケールの旗艦である『皇帝の誓い』号が、ウィンタースケール王朝の世界のひとつ、ケツァ・テメルの軌道上で発見されました。この件で何か指示はございますか」
languages.original_text: {n}After a brief hesitation, Vigdis's voice comes through the hissing of static once more.{/n} "Allow me to repeat, Lord Captain: the Emperor's Vow, the flagship of Rogue Trader Calligos Winterscale, has been detected in the orbit of Quetza Temer, one of the Winterscale worlds. What are your orders?"

traits.locale_text: {n}少しためらった後、ヴィグディスの声が雑音を通して再び聞こえてくる。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、もう一度聞いてください。自由開拓者、カリゴス・ウィンタースケールの旗艦である『皇帝の誓い』号が、ウィンタースケール王朝の世界のひとつ、ケツァ・テメルの軌道上で発見されました。この件で何か指示はございますか」

languages.text: {n}Vigdis, kısa bir müddet tereddüt ettikten sonra cızırtıların arasından tekrar sesini duyuruyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, müsaadenizle tekrar ediyorum: Hür Tacir Calligos Winterscale'in İmparator'un Andı adlı sancak gemisi, Winterscale Hanesi'ne ait dünyalardan Quetza Temer'in yörüngesinde tespit edildi. Emirleriniz nedir?"
languages.original_text: {n}After a brief hesitation, Vigdis's voice comes through the hissing of static once more.{/n} "Allow me to repeat, Lord Captain: the Emperor's Vow, the flagship of Rogue Trader Calligos Winterscale, has been detected in the orbit of Quetza Temer, one of the Winterscale worlds. What are your orders?"
